answers.answer: Congratulations mama!!! I'm glad you and him are doing well and I hope you have a quick recovery!!

question: I had an emergency csection sue to HELLP Syndrome/Preeclampsia on 12-20-12! His name is Brantley James and he weighed 5 pounds 7 oz and was 17 inches long! I carried til week 36+ 4 days! He is soo sweet and such a good baby!
title: he is HERE and 9 days old already!!!
